 (multipart/mixed) 
MIME element (text/plain) 
 
 
 
 
       (See attached file: C&D ISP love5season.com2.pdf) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
       Theplanet.com Internet services inc. 
       George Poletes 
       1333 Stemmons Fwy, Ste 110 
       Dallas, Texas 75207 
       USA 
 
       March 30, 2007 
 
 
       By email (abuse@theplanet.com ) 
 
 
       Re: Trademark claim 
 
 
       You  have  been  put in notice by letter dated January 26, 2007 that 
       you    were   providing   hosting   services   to   the   web   site 
       http://www.love5season.com/   (the   Website)  and  that  THIS  SITE 
       INFRINGED  UPON  LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIERâS TRADEMARKS. You helped us 
       to remove the infringing material. 
 
       Today,  it  is  coming  to  my  attention  that the Website is still 
       infringing  upon  LOUIS  VUITTON MALLETIERâS rights by offering as a 
       gift   a  cosmetic  pouch  bearing  the  LOUIS  VUITTON  MALLETIERâS 
       trademarks. 
 
       In  compliance  with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), we 
       ask  again  your  voluntary assistance in removing this web site, or 
       requiring  that  its  owner  ceases  any further infringement of the 
       LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIER  intellectual property rights. 
 
       We  would  appreciate  confirmation  of your action before April 10, 
       2007. 
 
 
       Sincerely, 
 
 
 
 
                                               Nikolay Livadkin 
 
 
Information  for  ThePlanet.com  Internet Services Inc. (IN COMPLIANCE WITH 
THE DMCA): 
 
1.    See above for signature. 
 
2.     http://www.love5season.com/ is using LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIERâs 
copyrighted material without authorization and selling counterfeit 
merchandise, which is prohibited by law. LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIER is the 
owner of the following rights: 
 
         |--------------------------+--------------------------| 
         |                          | Trademarks               | 
         |--------------------------+--------------------------| 
         |Louis Vuitton             | LVâ
